Private Litigation Case Title: Keshishzadeh v. Arthur J. Gallagher Service Co.

Description: Arthur J. Gallagher & Co. agreed to pay back $27 million to clients in settlement of allegations the insurance brokerage company accepted millions of dollars from insurers in exchange for steering clients toward those favored companies.

Agency: New Jersey Department of Banking & Insurance
